component.name: Portal for Teams
component.summary: Unofficial Microsoft Teams client for Linux

description.p: Experience seamless integration with the Microsoft Teams Web App in a standalone Electron application.
This application is an unofficial client for Microsoft Teams.

ul.li: Fix wrong console.warning error to console.warn
Update electron version to 33.3.0
Change Fetched custom background remote configuration... error to warning
Update electron version to 33.2.1
Fix selection of InTune user when explicitly pinning it via `ssoInTuneAuthUser`
Improving security on the loginForm by removing the need of contentIsolation
Removing the already deprecated `onlineCheckMethod` option from the config options
Updating the HISTORY section to be more inline with the current stated of affairs
Improving security on the streamSelector to work without the need of contentIsolation
Move from BaseView (deprecated), to WebContentsView in the streamSelector
Updating vsconfig to allow for electron and chrome debugging
Change the default value of frame to true
Package updates including moving to electron 33.2.0
Allow frameless window by using the config 'frame' option
Remove unused electron remote package
Update electron to 33.0.2
Remove electron-is-dev and just use the app.isPackaged
Other small library updates
Modifying the menu to include zoom, and help sections
Fix some sonarcloud detected issues
Add debug log for cookie change for authtoken and domain teams.microsoft.com
Updated electron to 32.2.0
Updated electron-builder 25.1.8
Automated network check and deprecating `onlineCheckMethod`
Changing default logger to console.info and no file, instead of using the electron-log defaults
Increase electron version to 32.1.2 and electron build to 25.0.5
Moving the notification number to be in the bottom right hand side of the icon
Add support to simulate Windows-based Chromium Browser
Added support for OpenSUSE to rpm distribution
Changing the T4L icons to comply with Flathub policies
refine disabling gpu and fix render-process-gone logging
Fix Incomplete regular expression for hostnames for github scanning in ms teams url
Printing the render-process-gone reason to help analyse #1369
Update the logger to be `electron-log` by default, and update the documentation, as the config options don't seem to overwrite the logger
Adding a new conditional for msteams meeting invites to handle the differences between v1 and v2
Revert the default url to be teams v1, not v2.
Update the logger to be `console` by default, as the documentation indicates
Update electron from 30.2.0 to 30.4.0
Update electron from eslint and global libraries
Add --class flag to allow setting the WM_CLASS property to a custom value
Apply disableHardwareAcceleration on disableGpu flag
Moving from lucid-log to electron-log
Adding --logConfig option to allow choosing between console, electron-log or Falsy (no logs in console)
Adding --help option to show the config options
Deprecating --appLogLevels in favor of --logConfig
Adding deprecated warning popup if deprecated options found to be in use
Refactoring the customBackground service and including an example
Updating electron to 30.2.0, and other small dependency updates
Fix awayOnSystemIdle behaviour when locking the screen: now it shows status as "Available" when locking the screen with awayOnSystemIdle = false
Increase electron version to 30.1.2
Fix handleOnCallConnected not calling disable screen lock
Adding contextIsolation and sandbox config options. These will break some functionality but are added as a WIP to help assessing what it would break
Add watchConfigFile option to restart the app if the configuration changes
Modify configError message to have an icon and adding the ability to provide warning dialogs (for config deprecations)
Changing app description to be more flathub compliat
Refactoring around inTune and the config file handling
Refactoring events to all be kebab-case instead of a mix of kebab-case and camelCase
FIX broken screen sharing during calls
App renamed to Portal for Teams in flathub
Moved to sonarcloud from codacity and fixed some sonarcloud issues
Moved from deprecated v2 version of codeql to v3
Added disableGlobalShortcuts config option to disable global shortcuts
Adding a meetupJoinRegEx config option to handle meetup-join/channel regular expressions
Aligning setWindowOpenHandler and processArgs to use the meetupJoinRegEx config option
Small linting fixes for css files
General small refactoring work
FIX missing icon in alt-tab
Improve tweaks css file, to hide the "waffle" menu and align the logo
FIX broken app when dbus not present
Moved from Yarn to NPM to simplify the build process
Add support for Single Sign On using Microsoft Intune
Adding --rpm-digest=sha256 to fix RPM insatll on FIPS enabled system
Adding teams.live.com to the URLs evaluated across the app
Renaming ssoUser to ssoBasicAuthUser, and ssoPasswordCommand to ssoBasicAuthPassswordCommand.
Adding the config option trayIconEnabled that defaults to true
Adding ssoUser and ssoPasswordCommand to allow to bypass needing to add your password.
Don't show error in case of missing config file.
Show error message if configuration is invalid
Fix awayOnSystemIdle flag in Teams V2
Fix custom backgrounds in Teams V2
Fix for away status detection (idle tracking)
Electron version downgraded to 29.3.0 due to inconsistent behaviour in different desktop environments
Electron version upgraded to 30.0.1
Updated implementation of Notification.requestPermission()
Revert "Build universal app for Mac" - the unsigned package does not run on Apple Silicon. See KNOWN_ISSUES.md for steps how to build the app for Apple Silicon locally.
Add isCustomBackgroundEnabled config option that defaults to true
Enable useMutationTitleLogic by default
Build universal app for Mac, to support Apple Silicon as well as Intel Macs
Electron version upgraded to 30.0.0
Clicking on notification shows the application
Rearranged quit menu
Added menu option to choose notification urgency
Now lets user choose the notification method and urgency
Support for electron CLI flags in config file
Additional logs for debugging custom background issues
Electron version upgraded to 29.3.0
Fix: Teams doesn't remember the setting disable notification sound
Electron version upgraded to 29.2.0
Now the notification badge count clears when all are read
updating tray icon with the number in the document.title. This is hidden behind a feature flag/config option called useMutationTitleLogic
moved trayIconRenderer out of the activityHub, and to react to events instead.
re-order config readme to show in the right order.
removing the 'removal' of the opt in for teamsv2. Now if you use that feature flag and want to revert you will need to do it manually.
adding how to debug in bug report, moving react logic into its own ha‚Ä¶ by @IsmaelMartinez in #1176
Feature/teams v2 changes theme by @IsmaelMartinez in #1177
feat: add opt in handling for teams v2 by @mhenselin in #1160
Removing the angular recurring call to disable some promotions as I s‚Ä¶ by @IsmaelMartinez in #1152
Hotfix/remove recurring angular call by @IsmaelMartinez in #1153
Hotfix/remove recurring angular call by @IsmaelMartinez in #1154
add support for changing idle (away) state in Teams2 by @bastidest in #1157
Added bail out logic to the angular detection as this is creating some memory issues in some users
New: Electron version upgraded to 29.1.1
New: Electron version upgraded to 29.0.1
Fix: Preload script error introduced in 1.4.11
Fix: MacOS - Disable Option + Left / Right keyboard shortcuts for history navigation (it is used for word jumping on MacOS)
New: Experimental switch --awayOnSystemIdle which sets the user status to away when system goes idle
New: Electron version upgraded to 28.2.1
New: Updated snap core to core22
New: Added --followSystemTheme config option
Fix: Notifications show the app's icon and not the sender's profile picture
New: Added the notification options to the tray menu
Fix: Wayland screenshare including system audio
Documentation: Added Flatpak config file location
New: Added apptitle to the tooltip
New: Rework wayland screenshare source selection
Fix: Getting version from cli arg with yargs after the Electron 28 bump
New: Electron version upgraded to 28.0.0
Fix: Updated ipc handlers for incomming call command
Electron version upgrade to 28.0.0
Update dependencies to latest versions
New: Make sure executable is writable before running fuses in afterpack script
Fix: Missing "Meeting started" notifications
New: Allow usage of arbitrary disable-features switch
New: Adds afterpack script to flip EnableCookieEncryption electron fuse
New: Increased node version in the runners
New: Enhanced zooming in and out controls
New: Added support for running custom scripts on events
Fix: custom css compatibility with New Teams
New: Moved about menu entry to bottom
Update: Upgraded electron version to 27.0.3
Update: Edited documentation
Updated documentation
Fix: Avoid calling child_process.exec with untrusted string
New: add flag --disableGpu to disable GPU and hardware acceleration
Update: Electron version upgraded to 27.0.2
Update: Electron version upgraded to 24.8.5
Fix: Import empty certificate path. The default config.clientCertPath is an empty string
Fix: A glitch in network waiting loop
Fix: fixed HTTPS network check from behind an HTTP proxy
New: Added --onlineCheckMethod {https,dns,native,none} to enable picking a different network check method (or disabling)
Update: reordering and cleaning up the list of config options
New: Added about dialog
New: Network check logic uses HTTP instead of DNS resolve
New: App now waits for network during start up. It waits for up to 30 seconds before becomes idle.
Default value for --onlineOfflineReload flag is set to false
New: More plugs added to snap package
New: Electron version downgraded to 24.6.3 due to multiple issues
New: Electron version upgraded to 25.4.0
Fix: White screen after wakeup from suspend mode
New: Electron version upgraded to 25.3.2
New: Workaround solution for screen sharing issues in Wayland
New: --bypassWaylandSourceSelection flag for those desktop environments that do not require additional video source selection dialog during screen-sharing request under Wayland
New: Spellchecker language selections are persisted between runs
Electron version upgraded to 24.6.3
New: Support for monochrome icon
New: Empty spellchecker language list disables spellchcker
New: Command-line argument --defaultURLHandler to change the browser application to be used to open links instead of the system default
Electron version downgraded to 24.6.2
Electron version upgraded to 25.2.0
New: Command line flag --disableAutogain
Fix: Tray icon missing when --menubar hidden parameter is used
New: Command-line parameter --menubar [auto | visible |hidden]
Fix: A rare crash when session times out
New: Added flag --disableNotificationWindowFlash which disables flashing the window frame when there is a new notification
New: Additional logs to debug notification issues
Restored appdata.xml
New: Badge count on supported desktop environments
Update: default value for disableNotificationSoundIfNotAvailable is set to false
Fix: External links are not opened correctly when they point to a Teams channel
New: Code refactoring
New: Now custom background images can be downloaded from a remote server
New: Command line parameter --customBGServiceIgnoreMSDefaults to ignore Microsoft provided images
New: Custom background service 'config.json' need not have prefix '/teams-for-linux/custom-bg/' for 'src' and 'thumb_src'
New: User can set custom backgrounds for video calls. Read the documentation in git repo
New: CTRL + Click for SSO login.
New: Settings menu entry with 'Save' and 'Restore'. Settings saved and restored are theme, chat density, devices.
New: Extended quit menu with 'Normally' and 'Clear Storage'. 'Normally' would be the default but 'Clear Storage' would give a fresh start on next launch.
New: Removed menu bar from the popup windows
New: Default chrome user agent set dynamically based on electron version
New: Safely open links
Update: Removed obsolete flag --enableDesktopNotificationsHack
Fix: Mac keyboard shortcuts are shown
New: Back/Forward navigation using keys
Fix: Now zoom in/out shortcuts work while on chat window
Fix: Right click link -> copy not working
Fix: Teams gets unloaded after suspend
New: Improved selection of spell check languages
New: Disable all notifications with --disableNotifications flag
New: Disable/Enable Notification Sound if not Available with --disableNotificationSoundIfNotAvailable flag
Fix: Teams gets unloaded after suspend
Minor code optimization
Updated documentation
New: Option to choose spellcheck language while writing
New: command line option --appActiveCheckInterval
Update: Application presence state optimisation
New: Command line option --screenLockInhibitionMethod to choose screen lock inhibition method. Possible values are Electron and WakeLockSentinel
Fix: away after a couple minutes
Added required permisions for inhibiting screen lock
Fix: Prevent screensaver while in call
Fix: Click on link to external meetings is ignored
Fix: No longer able to open meeting invitations in app
Fix: Option for SSO Login Popups for certain Apps
Fix: The new-window event is deprecated and will be removed. Please use contents.setWindowOpenHandler() instead
New: Set default spellchecker language to en-US
New: Disable hardware media key handling
New command line option --disableNotificationSound
Add doc for additional settings (#703)
New command line argument --appTitle for custom page title
Release to fix dependabot removing the "integration" section from the yarn.lock files
Bringing the multi account option to those who asked for it
Add: Option to load client certificates for corporate auth
Add: Corporate account authentication with smart-card
Add: Option to set the spellchecker languages
Add: WIP Mac OS support
Add: Minimal support for dark mode
Fix: Minimise on startup
Fix: Cannot find how to turn off notifications for started meetings (620)
Fix: Showing expired notifications
Fix: Prevent screensaver while in a call (613)
Fix: No meeting notifications in KDE (470)
Fix: The interstitial page of "Open Teams in Browser" / "Download Linux Client" / "Open in Teams App" opens when the app is started. By @breunigs
New: A command line flag (--clearStorage) to start afresh
Update: Electron version upgraded to 21.0.1
Fixed: Option closeAppOnCross not working (#602)
Update: Electron version upgraded to 20.2.0
Fixed: Right click in text box does not work (#594)
New: Spellcheck is back
Update: Electron version upgraded to 20.1.4

New: Command line argument --appLogLevels for controlling application logs. This can have values error, warn, info, debug. It can be single or multiple levels separated by comma. Default is error. Ex: --appLogLevels=error,warn
Fixed: No notification sound when installed through flatpak (569)
New: More flexible command line arguments
Fixed: No more notification sound (565)
Fixed: Add "zoom-in/out" functionnality (560)
Fixed: Impossible to submit company login (538)
Fixed: Open window when clicking on your launcher (556)
Electron version upgraded to 20.1.1
Fixed: Leaks X11 client connections, eventually causing screen sharing failure
Electron version upgraded to 20.0.2
Fixed: Kill signal does not terminate the app
Fixed: Cannot start teams-for-linux again after quit
Bumped electron version to 20.0.1
Bumped electron version to 20.0.0
Spellchecker is no longer available due to incompatibilities with the latest node versions
Fix: #519 Black window on wayland

description.p: Fixes available in this build:

ul.li: Fix: #455 Screen share: black screen + mouse vs Ubuntu 21.04 + Chrome. Thanks to @pablorq, @herbiejhopkins and @IsmaelMartinez
Fix: #505 Cannot share screen nor window with snap. Thanks to @crazyscientist and @jijojosephk.

description.p: Fixes available in this build:

ul.li: #447: Zoom resets to 100% on app close or refresh

description.p: Thanks @DiegoChajtur for reporting #447
Fixes available in this build:

ul.li: #488: Javascript error in main process

description.p: Thanks @FPSUsername for reporting #488
Latest release is out!

ul.li: Fix: #497 Flatpak install - Not launching from menu entry

description.p: Thanks to all who contributed to this project.
Screen sharing now works.

ul.li: Fix: #492 Can't share screen on Ubuntu

description.p: Thanks to all who contributed to this project.
This release has been focused on fixing flatpak runtime issues.

ul.li: Fix: #489 - Application fails to launch
Known issue: Screen sharing does not work

description.p: Thanks to all who contributed to this project.
This release has been focused on fixing flatpak runtime issues.
Thanks to all who contributed to this project.
This release has been focused on fixing small issues and improving screen sharing capabilities.

ul.li: Major bump from version 1.0.0 to 1.0.13
Migrated to Electron v15

description.p: Thanks to all who contributed to this project.

While we wait for Microsoft... Here we go, we are now version 1.0.0 üçæüéâ
This release has been focus on fixing small issues, improving config options (specially for proxy), adding some bots to help automation, adding more functionality to the right click button and automatically place your downloads into the download folder (opt in feature)

ul.li: Adding electron dl to automatically place your dowloads into the dowload folder (opt-in feature, check the config options) (#295)
Enabling the right click on url and adding copy URL to that menu option (#294)
Add proxy server to config options to ease configuration (#292)
Adding the 'try-supported-channel-layouts' to avoid locking the audio on the 1st instance (#291)
Feature/fix anylint issues and close #272 (#288)
Bump eslint-utils from 1.3.1 to 1.4.2 (#287)
fix: enable meetups join also for https protocol links (#283)
Updating stale.yml
feat: add join meeting via link outside application (#255)
Feat adding snyk (#260)
Replacing depShield for snyk to check vulnerabilities (#259)
revert - Fix depshield issues (#258)
Fix depshield issues (#256)
Update README.md
Adding stale bot
Fix merge issue (#238)

description.p:
Thanks to @standagh, @emanuelbatista, @jef79m and everybody that created issues/enhancements, fixed and/or tested them.
Special thanks to @julian-alarcon for continuously supporting the snap version of this project and to anyone else that is supporting other package types.
Thanks also to @byteSamurai for introducing hacktoverfest. I manage to get a t-shirt and to get a few people on my team to also contribute.
Its been a long ride, and looks like Microsoft has heard us out loud, but until they got something working as stable as this, I will continue contributing.
Release notes partly done by Stamp.
Because #217, you need to clear you config folder before your 1st login (config folder locations). This is not necessary if you are moving from version 0.6.6 or higher.
This release is been mostly concentrated on bug fixes and making this a bit more stable.

ul.li: Fix #220. Electron's getLocale, and Chromium's l10n_util, can return the language code in the IETF BCP 47 format (en-US) instead of the ISO 15897 format (en_US). Hunspell, the dictionaries included with this project, and the JavaScript code here assumes the ISO 15897 format, so this hotfix converts what getLocale returns. (#234) (97eb15f) Thanks to @pnickerson-cashstar
Add flatpak to configuration directory list (#232) (afbb725) Thanks to @agates
Fix #208. Increasing the electron-builder (#231) (555e364)
Fix #221: updating readme with a link to AppImageLauncher (#226) (4fce0df) Thanks to @orange-buffalo
Fix #171. Can't open Microsoft Teams - blank screen (#218) (f0242d2) Thanks to @inglor and @basaas
Fix #204. Updating default user agent string (#217) (952c55a) Thanks to @whofferbert
Feature #185 Adding the ability to toogle fullscreen f11 (#216) (adeec1d) Thanks to @rt3norio
Update KNOWN_ISSUES to reference cache folder (#171) (#210) (36af526) Thanks to @skyghis
Fix #182. Better handle external requests in new windows (#206) (599e140) Thanks to @HarlemSquirrel

description.p: Extras

ul.li: Special thanks also to all the people that reported issues, tested them, fixed them, improved the documentation, and, in general, helped making this a bit more stable. All of this will not be possible with your contributions.

description.p: Apologies if I have missed anyone.
Using gitflow from now on for releases (having master and develop branches) (Thanks to @julian-alarcon)
#149 Re-implementing the spellchecker to improve performance. (PR #152, #155 and #163)
#123 Is now possible as the main issue was with the spellchecker (issue #149)
#41 Teams-for-linux now also available in Flatpak! (Thanks to @gabops)
#99 Fixing the cursor in snap (PR #168)
#61 Improving the screen-share quality by adding a white end to the browserviews. This is a chrome issue that basically doesn't trigger then the antialiasing. Strange but it works! (PR #165)
#89 Adding the basic part for the xdg-open. This might need a few improvements as it is currently quite difficult to test. (PR #170)
#162 Improving the documentation for snap as people keep coming back reporting camera not working (Thanks @julian-alarcon) (PR in #167)
#171 blank screen issue. Workaround found and documented (Thanks to @sant123 for documenting and the others for finding/testing the solution!) (PR #178)
#176 Fixing the multiple icons in dock (Thanks to @lkms) (PR #179)
#98 Fixing the loop when launching that some people where experiencing.
#109 and #107 Improving the handling of "about:blank" links (mainly connectors and preview images) (Thanks to @HarlemSquirrel) (PRs #131 and #172)
Using gitflow from now on for releases (having master and develop branches) (Thanks to @julian-alarcon)
automating the snap release (Thanks to @julian-alarcon and @benyanke)
Fixing snap and camera not working together (Thanks to @julian-alarcon)
Unpacking the spellchecker dictionaries and adding the ones installed in hunspell (Thanks to @vadimi and @noderat )
Updating the MS icon (Thanks to @julian-alarcon)
removing the apparmor=DENIED messages in syslog for snap build (Thanks to @julian-alarcon)
Adding the --minimized option to start the app minimized (Thanks to @didster)
Adding webDebug to the tray menu options
